rules_text: All creatures get -3/-3 until end of turn. The next time one or more creatures you control die this turn, create an Aether token. [i](It's an enchantment with “Sacrifice two Aether: Draw a card.”)[/i]
flavor_text:
[i]“The hour of cleansing is at hand — by my hand shall the world be purged of this taint.”
—Legatus Nael van Darnus[/i]
